title: The General
description: Everyone in Navesink Bank knows about Senator Ericssonâ€™s son, his wife, and the story that hit headlines that eventually led to one of the Mallick boys going to jail for assault.  What became of that woman after being coerced into lying on the stand was unknown.  That was until late one night when a phone rang in the offices of Quinton Baird & Associates.  And her voice was on the other end of the line.
author: Jessica Gadziala
